an5.73:1.1: Atha kho annataro bhikkhu yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavoca:
an5.73:1.3: Kittavata nu kho, bhante, bhikkhu dhammavihari hoti”ti?
an5.73:2.2: suttam, geyyam, veyyakaranam, gatham, udanam, itivuttakam, jatakam, abbhutadhammam, vedallam.
an5.73:2.3: So taya dhammapariyattiya divasam atinameti, rincati patisallanam, nanuyunjati ajjhattam cetosamatham.
an5.73:2.4: Ayam vuccati, bhikkhu: ‘bhikkhu pariyattibahulo, no dhammavihari’.
an5.73:3.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhu, bhikkhu yathasutam yathapariyattam dhammam vittharena paresam deseti.
an5.73:3.2: So taya dhammapannattiya divasam atinameti, rincati patisallanam, nanuyunjati ajjhattam cetosamatham.
an5.73:3.3: Ayam vuccati, bhikkhu: ‘bhikkhu pannattibahulo, no dhammavihari’.
an5.73:4.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhu, bhikkhu yathasutam yathapariyattam dhammam vittharena sajjhayam karoti.
an5.73:4.2: So tena sajjhayena divasam atinameti, rincati patisallanam, nanuyunjati ajjhattam cetosamatham.
an5.73:4.3: Ayam vuccati, bhikkhu: ‘bhikkhu sajjhayabahulo, no dhammavihari’.
an5.73:5.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhu, bhikkhu yathasutam yathapariyattam dhammam cetasa anuvitakketi anuvicareti manasanupekkhati.
an5.73:5.2: So tehi dhammavitakkehi divasam atinameti, rincati patisallanam, nanuyunjati ajjhattam cetosamatham.
an5.73:5.3: Ayam vuccati, bhikkhu: ‘bhikkhu vitakkabahulo, no dhammavihari’.
an5.73:6.2: suttam, geyyam, veyyakaranam, gatham, udanam, itivuttakam, jatakam, abbhutadhammam, vedallam.
an5.73:6.3: So taya dhammapariyattiya na divasam atinameti, napi rincati patisallanam, anuyunjati ajjhattam cetosamatham.
an5.73:6.4: Evam kho, bhikkhu, bhikkhu dhammavihari hoti.
an5.73:7.1: Iti kho, bhikkhu, desito maya pariyattibahulo, desito pannattibahulo, desito sajjhayabahulo, desito vitakkabahulo, desito dhammavihari.
an5.73:7.2: Yam kho, bhikkhu, satthara karaniyam savakanam hitesina anukampakena anukampam upadaya, katam vo tam maya.
an5.73:7.3: Etani, bhikkhu, rukkhamulani, etani sunnagarani. Jhayatha, bhikkhu, ma pamadattha, ma paccha vippatisarino ahuvattha. Ayam vo amhakam anusasani”ti.
